Muy bueno la verdad,aunque yo prefiero mas el cs source mas que nada por los graficos,y porque no tengo que comprar balas aunque en el 1.6 los servers de zombie escape estan mas vivos que en el cs source.

The main menu made me nut instantly. This game is greeaaattt. If you're a long time player of CS 1.6, then you will definitely have a treat in playing this game since you can mod it and do many MANY things with it. There really isn't much to say about CS 1.6 since no matter how much we praise it, all the positive reviews and comments won't amount to how much great this game is. Over all, it's a good game, getting the bots will need some file managing but the hard work of modding the game will 100% be worth it.
